Text: This coffee smells very fragrant. Best coffee in the world.
I fed this canned food to my pet dog. It just can't stop licking the can after finishing the food.
Irresponsible seller. My son got sick after drinking this milk powder formula from X brand.
My kitty needed to see the vet after consuming the sardines. Poor cat.
How is this pancake low in sugar. It is so sweet. I cannot bear this sweetness.
Chrysanthemum tea always soothes my minds. Great drink.
